评论详情: True to size, modest length, great retro details, awesome color selection and very comfortable stretch.
The material is good quality, the dress was a perfect fit, it has a bit of stretch so i went down a size. I'm very happy with my purchase

Bought this for a 1940’s play I’m in. It fits beautifully. Just enough stretch without being frumpy looking. Feels well-made (doesn’t feel like it’s going to fall apart on-stage). I bought it in black, so the color is exactly as it’s described. Looks beautiful on. Very happy with this purchase.

I am impressed with the fabric quality of the dress. It feels like real clothing, not cheap like a costume.  The fit is great and I am happy overall. 5’1 125lbs. I bought a size small and it fits great!
Super cute vintage dress but it does run a tad small.

I absolutely adore this dress! I received so many compliments on it. High quality material and comfortable to wear. I plan on purchasing additional colors. I purchased an XXL because I am larger chested and it fit perfectly.
Such a cute dress. Great fit and true to description. Wioth the price I paid
Wore for services, worked great! But not awesome if you are super petite.

I was in a play that was set in the 1940s, and the costume dept. didn't really have anything for me that would work with the other 2 girls' dresses. I found this dress online, and it was just right. 1940's style, fit right, correct length, and right color. It was polyester, which I don't think? was around yet in the 40s - I don't know, but for a play, it worked, and the price was doable. It's subtle enough that I can wear it myself for a summer dress if I choose to, though the jury is out on that yet!

评论概述: SO FLATTERING. I didn't think it was possible.
评论详情: I'm stunned by how great-looking this dress is. I've tried for decades to find a dress like this and they almost always make me look matronly or ridiculous. I am a size 18 or 1x . I am huge chested and I have no waist. But this dress flatters everything. I just wear a simple shaper underneath and that's all. I bought the Teal and then I bought the Black. Give this dress a try if you've had vintage vixen dreams but have been disappointed again and again.

My Daughter is 5 ft 7 and about 125 lbs. We ordered a size small. The dress is PERFECT. Perfect fit, so cute, modest, stylishly vintage, and a great length. Its fun, unique, and not too short. Amazing and a great prize. She is wearing the dress for Homecoming and she is very pleased with the dress. THANK YOU!
Just took this out of pacakge it’s covered in stains and deodorant marks
This dress was super comfy and fun to wear to a 1940s themed party. It was a hit and I won best dressed :)
The color and fit is gorgeous. I don't love the material. It's a bit too thick and cheap-feeling for the price.
This dress is not only beautiful but compliments my body in the most stunning way!! I love the retro vibe!
I love this dress! It is very comfortable. I am a size 18 and the XXL was not too tight.
True to size. Material is not irritating to my skin. Fits well and comfortable. Nice dress!

I bought this dress to audition for a play set in the 1930s, and I love it - I'll be wearing it again for non-audition occasions (and yes, I got the role!) It fits well, the design is really figure-flattering, and the skirt is swingy - great little dress. I like it so much I ordered it again in black.
The only thing I dislike is that my belly sticks out and that is my problem, not the cute dress!
Love this dress.. bought it for Christmas.. might wear it in the summer.. idk depends on how wild I feel.
This dress is really cute and an amazing quality. The material is so nice! (Me, right, in the dress)

Great dress. I wanted to love it. Unfortunately, the chest fabric hangs way out. For those of us who are petite with small chests, the small is more like a med. to large in the chest.  and it just doesn't fit.
I’m a bit confused on whether the ruching is meant to go under the breast or not, but otherwise this product is amazing!
Pretty. The fabric was a little thin. Wasn’t the right size for me.
I would've given 5 stars but the dress was too short for me at 5'6". I loved the dress it was beautiful but unfortunately too short
I’m normally an XL but had to size up because of tightness in the hips area. Still cute and very comfy for a father daughter dance I volunteered at.
Great dress for a ‘40s inspired Christmas show I did. Love the material — doesn’t show sweat as a bonus! And it’s comfy and not clingy. Fit perfect (XL)

I bought it to wear in a community 1940s  play but will wear it to dinners.  The green color emphasizes my eyes.  I bought a second dress in wine for the holidays.  It fits perfectly, XL fits US14.  Launders well.

I've admired Belle Poque on here for a minute and finally bought this dress for a semi formal wedding. I'm pear shaped so this fits how I expected based on the size chart with it being a little loose in the chest, but I probably could've gotten away with sizing down since the fabric has a bit of stretch to it.  It's a nice lightish fabric that isn't scratchy or see through so I imagine I'll be very comfortable throughout the day.
Worked great for a Bonnie and Clyde outfit, super soft and flexible and would wear again!

Great product! The dress is definitely reproduction quality but the fabric is really sturdy and hangs well. Dress was washed (gentle) and dried (low heat) and came through fine. I’m 5’5” and a full size 16 and the 2XL was really flattering. I did use shareware because of the fabric but for the price point this was a VERY good purchase. I have other Belle Poque pieces as well and have been pleased with them all.
Loved the way this fit, very true to size. Wore to a Casablanca screening and received many compliments.

For reference, I am 5’3”, 130lbs, and am curvy (chest- 36”, waist- 29, hips 38”) and ordered a M (8) in wine.  This dress is a deep beautiful burgundy and the cut is VERY flattering, it is hard to find dresses that aren’t too revealing or too frumpy. I was worried the split at the neckline would be too low, but it just right and remains modest. This dress falls at my knee and is made from a thicker material. Also my thicker upper arms have plenty of room in the sleeves.  I absolutely love this dress and am happy with this purchase!
This dress is beautiful and very flattering, I truly recommend

This dress has such a great vintage look and can be casual or dressed up. I am 5'2 small chested and 125 pounds. I purchased a small and it fits perfectly! It's very comfortable and easy to wear, and it's also extremely slimming. This dress has decent stretch to it as well.
Quality and weight are nice. Flattering cut. Served the purpose for a period party.

评论概述: Beautiful dress at a great price!
评论详情: I'm super picky with the way a dress fits. I followed the measurements on the sizing guide, and the fit on this dress was perfect! It's a flattering style, and well made with a nice, mid-weight fabric. The vintage styling is very attractive, and should look good on most body types IF the fit is correct. Go by the measurements on the sizing guide and you won't go wrong. I ordered the black and like it so much I may order one in another color!
Stunning, flattering, fit as expected.
Good quality, comfy, nice vintage look

Follow Amazon’s size suggestions.  I’m 5’ 4”, size 14, and chesty.  The large fit and I felt like a 1940s movie star.  I paired this with bone colored Jessica Simpson heels and a dark teal Dasein handbag.  All were Amazon purchases.  I was a glam girl too die for.

评论概述: Good design and color; cute dress
评论详情: The color is rich, and the cut of the dress is very cute. I returned it, but not because of a fault in the dress. Though it fit me technically, I was not comfortable with the form-fitting result, again, not a flaw in the dress. The fabric is low-maintenance and not the highest quality (consider the price), but good enough for its intended purpose. I would suggest not sitting on a textured surface (ledge of a fountain, exterior steps to a building, etc.) to avoid picks or pilling.

This dress wasn’t bad but it also wasn’t great. I have a torso on the shorter side and so this made the top sit a bit lower than I’d like and the arm holes were a little bigger than I would have wanted. The dress itself was also a little too long on me. I’m 5 ft 3.
Fits great! Beautiful dress.
Fit perfect! True to size.
Great color. Got shoes to match. The material is a little stretchy but not too much to be out of shape. And it's breathable

评论用户: Iam impressed about the product. Keep it up Amazon
评论概述: Good quality dress. I love it
评论详情: I love the dress so much. The quality is amazing
Wore the dress in a play 1940’s I’m a 12 bought a large returned for the xtra large. Rubs small tight in the bust lovely though
just darling dress. Color and fit as expected.

评论概述: It made my fiancé's jaw drop!
评论详情: It's lovely! It turns heads, that's for sure. Great length, comfortable material, and very flattering cut.
Got this in black (size M) for my 12 yr olds 1930s speech... its so flattering! It fits us both! So I'm buying another one in a different color! She's 5' 3"(120 lbs), I'm 5' 1" (140 lbs).
I purchased this dress as a costume for a small film assignment my daughter had. It came exactly as desired and worked well. It looked lovely on the actress.

评论概述: Prettiest dress I’ve had in a while
评论详情: I can’t say enough! I absolutely love this! It’s so flattering. I’m a curvy 4’11 with 36D -DD chest. I wear a size 6/8 and ordered a medium. It fits like a glove and hugs my curves in all the right ways. I’ve never felt prettier in a dress. I want it in every color. It is sturdy fabric but moves and feels lightweight. It goes just below my knees which is a little longer than I would like but it could be easily hemmed. Buy it!
It was perfect for my 40s party.  Cute and comfortable
Second color I’ve bought in this. Great fabric and quality. The green fit better than the blue personally.

I'm 5'4" and 150 lbs, ordered a size medium, fits perfectly.  The material isn't too thin or too clingy.  The zipper is a bit of a pain to do by yourself, but that's my only complaint.  Great dress for Easter morning.
Looks amazing, received lots of Complements
Awesome! Great for swing dancing
Fits perfectly.  Love the color.  I went ahead abs bought others in black and green.
WOW. THIS DRESS…. No words, it looks absolutely amazing.
Nice fabric and good construction on the dress, the pattern was a little funky on me, the waist was about three inches above my natural waist.
Love this dress.  It fit perfect and was very comfortable.  Wore this dress to a Vintage party.

评论概述: They sent me a different style dress
评论详情: Dress on right is the one I ordered. The one on the left is a completely different one they sent me. I ordered two of this dress for a dance routine where we would both match. They sent me one  dress that is what I ordered, but the second dress is a completely different style. I don't have time to get the correct dress as the competition is in just a couple days. So disappointed with this purchase as neither dresses are good quality or material either.
This dress was so cute! The only thing is is that my boobies are really small and where the breast portion of the dress starts is a little bit too low for me. So sad.
It’s a beautiful piece and also affordable. I also like the quality of the stitch and fabric detail; specially the variety of colors available. Thank you 🥰
The fit was perfect and the dress was so comfortable. I received many compliments!
I received so many compliments. This dress fits as expected. I did refer to the size chart. The is material is thick and sewn well. Very flattering. The color is as shown in the image.

评论概述: DO NOT BUY. ITEM NOT AS DESCRIBED.
评论详情: Instead of the wine-coloured dress shown in the image, I received a garishly red dress with a horribly thick neck "tie" rather than the cute ribbon bow. The quality is very low. I think the picture was stolen, I was hoping to wear this to a wedding and I'm very disappointed.
This is so cute and flattering. I received a bunch of compliments while wearing it. I was looking for something work appropriate with some vintage flair, this did the trick.
Pretty darn cute!
Order a size up this is a snug fit dress. Material is nice and dress is tailored well in general.

This is a great little dress. Super classy and perfect length.  I could have sized down to a Large.  I'm a true 14 and size Large in shirts. Size 36C in chest. I have an hourglass shape with 45" hips.  The Large would have fit better in my chest.  You will be so happy you ordered this!
What more is there to ask.
The fit is so flattering it was order with a few other dresses and it’s easily the favorite for my daughters bridal shower!
Took a chance and ordered. Beautiful. Fits nicely. Color is stunning! You won’t regret it!

I’m 5’3” and usually wear an XL, and the XL fits perfectly and isn’t too short or too long, it hits right at the knee. The fabric is soft and thick, it’s really nice quality and very flattering, I love it!!
Adorable and flattering for a 5' frame. Feels like it can be dressed up or down and worn in any season.
I LOVE this dress! The fabric is a nice quality, not too thin. It has a light stretch to it as well so it is super comfy!
